sentences.en: A Wall Street Journal editorial encapsulated the views of many conservatives.
sentences.cn: 《华尔街日报》的一篇社论概述了很多保守派人士的观点。

sentences.en: an accusation that is really off the wall.
sentences.cn: 确实荒谬可笑的指控

sentences.en: He flattened himself against a brick wall as I passed.
sentences.cn: 他紧贴一面砖墙站着好让我通过。

sentences.en: He spent hours throwing a tennis ball against a wall.
sentences.cn: 他好几个小时都对着一堵墙掷网球。

sentences.en: I cut it out and pinned it to my studio wall.
sentences.cn: 我把它剪下来钉在我工作室的墙上。

sentences.en: Lean the plants against a wall and cover the roots with peat.
sentences.cn: 把植物靠墙摆放，用泥煤盖住根部。

sentences.en: saw the writing on the wall and fled the country.
sentences.cn: 觉察到凶兆立即逃到了国外

sentences.en: tensions that are driving me up the wall.
sentences.cn: 使我心烦意乱的压力

sentences.en: The birds cling to the wall and nibble at the brickwork.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿们紧贴在墙上，啄着砖缝。

sentences.en: The child kept her eyes fixed on the wall behind him.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩眼睛一直紧盯着他身后的那堵墙。

sentences.en: The dogs are always rubbing against the wall and making dirty marks.
sentences.cn: 那些狗老是往墙上蹭，留下了斑斑污迹。

sentences.en: The frames are secured by horizontal rails to the back wall.
sentences.cn: 框架用横杆牢牢固定在后墙上。

sentences.en: the Great Wall of China
sentences.cn: 中国的长城

sentences.en: The most arresting feature is the painted wall decoration.
sentences.cn: 最醒目的特点是绘有图画的墙面装饰。

sentences.en: The only wall decorations are candles and a single mirror.
sentences.cn: 墙上唯一的装饰是几支蜡烛和一面镜子。

sentences.en: The pockmarks made by her bullets are still on the wall.
sentences.cn: 墙上仍然有她的子弹留下的凹坑。

sentences.en: the president was off the wall about the article.
sentences.cn: 总统对那篇文章十分气愤。

sentences.en: the tendency for poets to &B{go to the wall for} their beliefs.
sentences.cn: 诗人们为了他们的信仰而不惜一切代价的倾向。

sentences.en: The wall caved in to reveal a blocked-up Victorian fireplace.
sentences.cn: 墙坍塌了，露出砌在里面的维多利亚时代的壁炉。

sentences.en: There were wall-to-wall people, all invited guests and celebrities.
sentences.cn: 到处都是人，全是邀请来的贵客名流。

sentences.en: We climbed over the wall into the orchard.
sentences.cn: 我们翻墙进了果园。

sentences.en: When Caroline was five she scribbled on a wall.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳5岁时在墙上乱涂乱画。

phrases.phrase: between you and me and the wall
go to the wall informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: 万里长城；中国长城计算机集团公司
[美俚]荒诞的；疯狂的；本能的；即兴的

phrases.phrase: off the wall N. Amer. informal 北美，非正式

phrases.tran_cn: 剪力墙；抗震墙，耐震壁；风力墙
狂怒恼火的：进入极端沮丧、愤怒或悲哀的状态
（地毯或其他铺地材料）铺满整个地板的

phrases.phrase: writing on the wall 或 handwriting on the wall
phrases.tran_cn: 凶兆：对于未来事件发展的不祥预示

trans.tran_en: an upright flat structure made of stone or brick, that divides one area from another or surrounds an area
an upright flat structure made of stone or brick, that divides one area from another or surrounds an area
